title: Emerald Elegance: Antique Finish AD Stone Haaram with Pearl Drops
materials: Base metal alloy with gold tone finish
embellished with high-quality American Diamond (AD) stones and synthetic emeralds. Simulated pearls add a touch of classic elegance. Features a durable gold tone chain.
features: This striking haaram features a detailed floral and geometric design studded with sparkling AD stones and vivid green emeralds. The central pendant showcases a captivating combination of these stones. Delicate pearl drops add a touch of traditional charm and movement. The design blends traditional South Indian aesthetics with modern sensibilities, suitable for a variety of occasions.
colors: with the soft luster of white pearls.
occasions: and traditional South Indian ceremonies like muhurtham
and other festive events. Also suitable for adding a touch of elegance to formal modern occasions.
description: This haaram offers a perfect blend of tradition and contemporary style. The high-quality AD stones provide a brilliant sparkle, mimicking the allure of real diamonds at an accessible price. The rich color combination of emeralds, AD stones, and pearls is timeless and complements a wide range of outfits. Durable construction ensures lasting beauty and enjoyment.
